description: MOOCs are taking the world by storm, but what exactly is a MOOC?<br style=""><br style="">This course raises your awareness of this popular form of education, and gives you the insight you need to start leveraging them for your own teaching and learning.<br style=""><br style="">You will learn what a MOOC is, where to find them, who delivers them, the courses that are available, how to sign up, what a MOOC looks like, and how you can learn socially through a MOOC.<br style=""><br style="">This course includes a tour of a real MOOC, plus recorded Q&A sessions with the instructor.
title: The Wide World of MOOCs
